entity: To Hal Needham, an innovator, mentor, and master technician who elevated his craft to an art and made the impossible look easy.
To D.A. Pennebaker, who redefined the language of film and taught a generation of filmmakers to look to reality for inspiration.
To George Stevens, Jr., a tireless champion of the arts in America and especially that most American of arts: the Hollywood film.

category: SCIENTIFIC AND TECHNICAL AWARD (Academy Award of Merit)
entity: To COOKE OPTICS LIMITED for their continuing innovation in the design, development and manufacture of advanced camera lenses that have helped define the look of motion pictures over the last century.

category: SCIENTIFIC AND TECHNICAL AWARD (Scientific and Engineering Award)
entity: To SIMON CLUTTERBUCK, JAMES JACOBS and DR. RICHARD DORLING for the development of the Tissue Physically-Based Character Simulation Framework.

category: SCIENTIFIC AND TECHNICAL AWARD (Scientific and Engineering Award)
entity: To DR. PHILIP McLAUCHLAN, ALLAN JAENICKE, JOHN-PAUL SMITH and ROSS SHAIN for the creation of the Mocha planar tracking and rotoscoping software at Imagineer Systems Ltd.

category: SCIENTIFIC AND TECHNICAL AWARD (Scientific and Engineering Award)
entity: To JOE MURTHA, WILLIAM FREDERICK and JIM MARKLAND of Anton/Bauer, Inc. for the design and creation of the CINE VCLX Portable Power System.

category: SCIENTIFIC AND TECHNICAL AWARD (Technical Achievement Award)
entity: To J.P. LEWIS, MATT CORDNER and NICKSON FONG for the invention and publication of the Pose Space Deformation technique.

category: SCIENTIFIC AND TECHNICAL AWARD (Technical Achievement Award)
entity: To LAWRENCE KESTELOOT, DREW OLBRICH and DANIEL WEXLER for the creation of the Light system for computer graphics lighting at PDI/DreamWorks.

category: SCIENTIFIC AND TECHNICAL AWARD (Technical Achievement Award)
entity: To STEVE LaVIETES, BRIAN HALL and JEREMY SELAN for the creation of the Katana computer graphics scene management and lighting software at Sony Pictures Imageworks.

category: SCIENTIFIC AND TECHNICAL AWARD (Technical Achievement Award)
entity: To THEODORE KIM, NILS THUEREY, DR. MARKUS GROSS and DOUG JAMES for the invention, publication and dissemination of Wavelet Turbulence software.

category: SCIENTIFIC AND TECHNICAL AWARD (Technical Achievement Award)
entity: To RICHARD MALL for the design and development of the Matthews Max Menace Arm.

category: JOHN A. BONNER MEDAL OF COMMENDATION
entity: To Bill Taylor in appreciation for outstanding service and dedication in upholding the high standards of the Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences.
